Conversion Views

class conversion.views.ConversionAPI(**kwargs)

Bases: APIView

API to convert an amount of one currency to another currency

The API expects the following parameters in the URL: - from_currency: The currency to convert from - to_currency: The currency to convert to - amount: The amount to convert

The API returns the converted amount in the ‘converted_amount’ field of the response

get(request, from_currency, to_currency, amount)
